channel.title: How about a laf
channel.description:
how about a look and feel as a community project?
one basic theme, and everyone contributes to the laf ;o

item.title: How about a laf
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:

[quote=“Uriko, post:11, topic:108411”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=155197.msg1468835#msg1468835 date=1181599012]

humor

badum-bum-CHING!

Thank you.

Tbh, a L&F project does sound pretty good. Will it be anyone who has a basic knowledge of Java can be involved or will it be a select few of the best?

[/quote]Well, if it’s a community project… lol.[/quote]

Yes, but is it, the code will be there anyone can mess about with it. Or will there be people who are the controllers of the code if you like and people can pm them edits etc…

item.title: How about a laf
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:7, topic:108411”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=155197.msg1463804#msg1463804 date=1181519050]
Who will we be looking at and feeling?
[/quote]

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Look_and_feel
http://today.java.net/pub/a/today/2004/02/27/laf.html
http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/javax/swing/UIManager.html

look and feel (or L&F) is how a GUI is drawn, its color, shape, size (the look)
and how it behaves, what happens when you click, how does it resize (the feel)

swing can have many L&F managers, the most popular is ‘metal’, moparisthebests main page uses it
you can get it by doing JFrame.setDefaultLookAndFeelDecorated(true);
you can also use the system L&F, so you can make your java application look totally native

this project, is we make our own L&F[/quote]

I know, I googled before I posted. Just thought I’d add some (pretty crap) humor into this thread.

Read full topic

item.title: How about a laf
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

Gotta Catch Them All:

Who will we be looking at and feeling?

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Look_and_feel
http://today.java.net/pub/a/today/2004/02/27/laf.html
http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/javax/swing/UIManager.html

look and feel (or L&F) is how a GUI is drawn, its color, shape, size (the look)
and how it behaves, what happens when you click, how does it resize (the feel)

swing can have many L&F managers, the most popular is ‘metal’, moparisthebests main page uses it
you can get it by doing JFrame.setDefaultLookAndFeelDecorated(true);
you can also use the system L&F, so you can make your java application look totally native

this project, is we make our own L&F

Read full topic
